book.synopsis: The Rough Guide to Vietnam is ideal for people who want to travel independently and discover more about this incredibly diverse country. It includes lively reviews of the best places to eat, from street kitchens to the upmarket restaurants of Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi, and practical advice on activities, from home-stays in ethnic minority villages to boat trips around Ha Long Bay and visits to its national parks. There are extensive, user-friendly descriptions of Vietnam\x92s many sights, including Hu√©\x92s Imperial city, temples and pagodas and Vietnam\x92s impressive colonial architecture, as well as its deserted beaches and the waterways of the Mekong Delta.
book.title_long: The Rough Guide to Vietnam (Rough Guide Travel Guides)
